resource_dependency.stockSearchAPI: An API for retrieving stock data by code or name, supporting search and autocomplete suggestions.

function: Enable users to search for stocks using either stock codes or company names.
static_description: A centered search bar with a placeholder 'Enter stock code or name', accompanied by a search icon (searchIcon) on the right side. Background is white, input field border is navy.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the search icon initiates the search query based on the input value.
Pressing Enter while focused on the input field triggers the search action.

resource_dependency.autocompleteAPI: An API that provides real-time autocomplete suggestions as the user types in the search field.
resource_dependency.suggestionDropdownStyle: Navy text on white background with hover effect highlighting selected item in light gray.

function: Provide real-time autocomplete suggestions when users type into the stock search input.
static_description: A dropdown menu appears below the search bar showing matching stock suggestions dynamically. Each suggestion includes both the company name and ticker symbol.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a suggestion populates the search bar with the selected stockâ€™s identifier and navigates to the stock dashboard.
Hovering over a suggestion highlights it visually according to the defined style (suggestionDropdownStyle).

resource_dependency.stockInfoSchema: Database schema containing fields: ticker_symbol (string), company_name (string), current_price (float), last_updated (datetime).
resource_dependency.dashboardLayout: Grid-based layout with card components for each piece of information.

function: Display essential stock details such as company name, ticker symbol, and current price.
static_description: A responsive grid layout featuring three cards arranged horizontally or vertically depending on screen size. Cards display 'Company Name:', 'Ticker Symbol:', and 'Current Price:' labels followed by their respective values retrieved from the database (stockInfoSchema). All elements use white background and navy text.

resource_dependency.chartingLibrary: Integration with a charting library like Chart.js or D3.js for rendering interactive financial charts.
resource_dependency.historicalDataAPI: API providing time-series stock price data including date and closing prices.
resource_dependency.trendChartColors: #000080 for line graphs representing price movement

function: Visualize historical stock price trends through interactive charts.
static_description: An area chart displayed within a container titled 'Market Trends'. X-axis shows dates, Y-axis displays prices. Line color follows trendChartColors. Tooltips appear on hover showing exact values.

interaction_and_states.description: Displays tooltip with precise date and price value at hovered point.
Selects a specific time range (e.g., 1 month, 6 months, 1 year) to filter the chart view.

resource_dependency.financialDataSchema: Database schema containing fields: revenue (float), net_income (float), eps (float), pe_ratio (float), debt_equity_ratio (float), roe (float), etc.
resource_dependency.dataTableStyle: Table styled with alternating row colors, navy headers, and white cells.

function: Present detailed financial metrics including revenue, earnings, and key ratios.
static_description: Tabular representation of financial data with columns labeled Revenue, Earnings, EPS, P/E Ratio, Debt/Equity, ROE, etc. Data sourced from financialDataSchema. Styled using dataTableStyle.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking column headers sorts the table ascending/descending based on clicked metric.

resource_dependency.reportOptionsConfig: Pre-defined set of report customization options including checkboxes or toggles for different sections (Basic Info, Market Trends, Financial Data, Company Profile)

function: Allow users to customize what content appears in generated reports.
static_description: Form-style interface presenting toggle switches or checkboxes labeled Basic Info, Market Trends, Financial Data, Company Profile. Generate Report button (generateReportButton) located beneath form. White background with navy controls.

interaction_and_states.description: Toggling any checkbox adds/removes corresponding section from the final report preview or generation queue.

resource_dependency.formatSelectorStyle: Dropdown styled with navy border and text, white background.

function: Permit users to choose desired output format for exporting generated reports.
static_description: Dropdown menu listing available export formats (PDF, HTML, Spreadsheet). Default selection is PDF. Styled per formatSelectorStyle. Positioned near the Generate Report button.

interaction_and_states.description: Opens dropdown menu to reveal available export format choices.
Selecting an option updates the export preference used during report generation.

resource_dependency.reportEngineService: Backend logic responsible for compiling selected data into a structured document based on chosen format and content preferences.
resource_dependency.templateFiles: Pre-designed templates for PDF, HTML, and spreadsheet layouts.

function: Automatically compile selected stock data into formatted reports based on user inputs.
static_description: Not visible directly but handles internal processing of combining data sources and applying formatting templates before delivering the final report file.

function: Maintain consistent visual styling across the application with a white background and navy components.
static_description: Entire site utilizes uiThemeTokens for uniform coloring. Headers, buttons, borders, and active states utilize navy (#000080); backgrounds remain white (#FFFFFF). Fonts follow fontFamily setting throughout.

resource_dependency.filterDropdownStyle: White background with navy borders and text.

function: Enable filtering and sorting capabilities for financial data tables and market trend visualizations.
static_description: Filter icons placed next to table headers and chart controls. Dropdown menus styled with filterDropdownStyle allow selecting criteria like date ranges or numerical thresholds.

interaction_and_states.description: Opens filter/sort modal or dropdown where users can define custom filters or sort orders.

resource_dependency.realTimePriceAPI: API endpoint returning live or delayed stock pricing data periodically updated.

function: Update displayed stock prices in near real-time without manual refresh.
static_description: Displayed price figures update automatically every 5 minutes via polling mechanism connected to realTimePriceAPI. Timestamp indicating last update shown alongside price.

resource_dependency.companyProfileSchema: Database schema containing fields: company_name (string), description (text), industry (string), headquarters (string), ceo (string), board_members (array).

function: Show detailed company profiles including business overview and leadership team.
static_description: Section titled 'Company Profile' displaying description paragraph, industry classification, location, CEO name, and executive photos if available. Uses executivePhotoPlaceholder for missing images. Layout uses white background and navy headings.

resource_dependency.watchlistStorage: User-specific storage mechanism (localStorage/session or backend DB) to maintain tracked stocks.

function: Allow users to save favorite stocks into a personal watchlist for easy tracking.
static_description: Bookmark icon positioned prominently on stock dashboards and search results. Icon changes between bookmarkIconInactive and bookmarkIconActive depending on whether the stock is currently saved.

interaction_and_states.description: Adds/removes current stock from user's watchlist. Updates icon accordingly and persists change in watchlistStorage.

resource_dependency.fileDownloadHandler: Client-side handler triggering browser download dialog for generated reports.

function: Enable downloading of completed reports onto the user's local device.
static_description: After clicking 'Generate Report', a 'Download' link or button becomes enabled. File downloads immediately upon click using fileDownloadHandler, respecting supportedFileTypes.

interaction_and_states.description: Triggers browser-native download prompt allowing user to save the report locally.
